question: What is the central healthcare facility located in the southern part of Trakai, Lithuania?
true_answer: Trakai District Central Hospital and Polyclinic.
asked_question_translated: ¿Cuál es el centro sanitario central situado en la parte sur de Trakai (Lituania)?
answer: El centro sanitario central situado en la parte sur de Trakai (Lituania) es el Hospital de Trakai.
answer_translated_eng: The central health centre in the southern part of Trakai (Lithuania) is the Trakai Hospital.
